P044383.project_name: URBAN TRANSPORT REFORM AND CAPACITY BUILDING TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE PROJECT

project_abstract.cdata: The main objective of the Urban Transport Reform and Capacity Building (Technical Assistance) Project is to assist in providing more affordable, reliable, and safer public transport services in the metropolitan area of Dakar. This project includes two main components: (1) Institutional development through consultant's services and short-term technical assistance, training and an awareness campaign to (a) establish and manage a coordinating body, which will gather the main actors of the sector; (b) privatize the Senegalese bus company, including assisting the development of a leasing scheme for urban transport operators, and revising the regulatory framework for providing urban transport services; (c) establish a sustainable financing mechanism for the sector through an urban transport development fund; and (d) implement a traffic management scheme and a road safety action plan with users participation; and (2) Minor civil works such as rehabilitating bus stops, bus lane arrangements, fitting encroachments, and intermodal slots.
